titles.title: Honoring Rick Lee Schwartz and Milt Stollak, who died in a plane crash on July 18, 2002, while fighting the Big Elk fires near Estes Park, Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Introduced. Honors the bravery and service of firefighters Rick Lee Schwartz and Milt Stollack who died in a plane crash on July 18, 2002, while fighting the Big Elk fires near Estes Park, Colorado. Urges individuals to contribute to the Air Tanker 123 Memorial Fund honoring such men.
